::KitKat::

"Well, if there is anything I can do, let me know. Oh, By the way, you know 
of any other wolves in the area.  I spotted one at the old maximal base.  An 
owl and a wolf were talking.  Nothing useful I'm afraid. But I smelled 
another male wolf.  I wonder if he's one of ours or not. You know, just in 
case I run into him." She was bored and just trying to drum up conversation.

-----Original Message----
From: Talon Harvilicz  <wilddance_mare@h...>
Date: Tue Jul 4, 2000 7:48pm
Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Quickstrike:

Quickstrike glowered at Sinester. He said to Sinesis: "Well, if he starts
anythin' wit' 'er, then someone's gonna have t' use th' muzzle on th'
tin-horn." He walked away from the two brothers and sat back down on the
chair in front of th console. He leaned against it, when KitKat came to him.
He was almost surprised to see her. He rarely saw her around the base.

She sounded bored, and so was she. "Well, honestly wolfie, ah's ain't got no
orders. Ah'm waitin' fer Boss-bot and Dark Mouse t' get back. Ah had uh job
fer Dark Mouse, but she ran off." He looked at the screen. "There's uh bot
ah know who can help. Thing is ah need t' send uh flier and give 'im th'
coordinates."
